effect.scarlet_violet: User faints. Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.
effect.the_teal_mask: User faints. Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.
effect.the_indigo_disk: User faints. Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP and PP restored and its status conditions cured.
